title: Enhancing Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Residential Building Design Optimization Techniques for Climate Change Response

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural design and thermodynamics concepts, foundational data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform simulations to improve the Energy Use Intensity (EUI) of residential buildings by 20% or more, reflecting climate change scenarios.
Application of optimization techniques for architectural elements (shading, ventilation, insulation) to maintain the thermal comfort index (HI, Humidex) range
Derivation of a plan to reduce the indoor overheating index (IOhD) by 20% using a machine learning-based design optimization process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
